mapper.insert: INSERT INTO street_lamp.test_street_lamp_state (beacon_addr, beacon_id, location, date_time, power_off, abnormal_blink, short_circuit, lamp_failure, lamp_state, illumination, x, y) VALUES (#{beacon_addr}, #{beacon_id}, #{location}, #{date_time}, #{power_off}, #{abnormal_blink}, #{short_circuit}, #{lamp_failure}, #{lamp_state}, #{illumination}, #{x}, #{y})
mapper.update: UPDATE street_lamp.test_street_lamp_state SET beacon_addr=#{beacon_addr}, beacon_id=#{beacon_id}, location=#{location}, date_time=#{date_time}, power_off=#{power_off}, abnormal_blink=#{abnormal_blink}, short_circuit=#{short_circuit}, lamp_failure=#{lamp_failure}, lamp_state=#{lamp_state} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO street_lamp.test_tb_failure_history (beacon_addr, beacon_id, location, date_time, failure_reason_text, failure_reason_id, repair, recent, failure_type) VALUES (#{beacon_addr}, #{beacon_id}, #{location}, #{date_time}, #{failure_reason_text}, #{failure_reason_id}, #{repair}, #{recent}, #{failure_type});
